response.original_title: 清純OL　覚えたての快感
response.overview: Kiriko (Tatsumi Yui), who works as a staff member at a local newspaper, has a serious and modest personality. Dragging painful experiences from the past, she has lived a life far removed from romance. Meanwhile, her colleague Hidemi (Shijimi), who has the opposite personality to Kiriko, is lively, popular with men, and uses sex as a way to relieve stress. Hidemi urges Kiriko to be more proactive in romance. One day, Kiriko likes the atmosphere of a coffee shop she went to with Hidemi and starts to frequent it. There she meets Yosuke, a regular customer at the shop. They order the same menu, and little by little they start to talk to each other, and Kiriko begins to take an interest in Yosuke, but...
response.title: Innocent Office Lady: A Newly Discovered Pleasure
